text:
Bollywood actor Arjun Kapoor is back with yet another phenomenal thriller. After having a mixed response with hits like 2 States, Ki & Ka and few flops like Namaste England and Half Girlfriend, the actor has transformed himself in a serious avatar.
Arjun, who will soon be seen in India's Most Wanted, dropped the trailer of the same. Based on true events, the movie brings to life the story of one of the biggest covert operations undertaken in the country.
Instagram/AK fanclub
The movie is about 5 unlikely heroes, who captured one of India’s most dangerous terrorists without firing a single bullet. Trying to catch India's Osama with true grit and determination.
Don't Miss 862 SHARES 183 SHARES 151 SHARES
,
Directed by Raj Kumar Gupta, who has earlier given us Raid, No One Killed Jessica and Aamir, the movie is slated to release on 24th May, 2019. After this, Arjun Kapoor will next be seen in Panipat in yet another royal warrior look.
title: India's Most Wanted Trailer Shows Arjun Kapoor Nabbing A Terrorist Without Using A Single Weapon
